divs: Sighting DetailsI was up near the local McDonald's, getting me some food since I had the MUNCHIES and I saw this thing shooting along. It didn't make a noise at all, and I was scared so bad that I lost my desire to eat. It flew along in a straight line that looked like it was going down a little bit. After watching the object for maybe a minute and a half it disappeared behind some trees.
